definition: net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Who is the man with the beard?
sentences.chinese: 那个长着络腮胡子的人是谁？

sentences.english: He shaved off his beard but kept his moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他刮了下巴上的络腮胡子，但仍留着嘴边的胡髭。

sentences.english: Would you like me to shave off your beard?
sentences.chinese: 要我把您的络腮胡子刮掉吗？

sentences.english: Listen to the tape then answer this question. Who is the man with the beard?
sentences.chinese: 听录音，然后回答问题。那个长着络腮胡子的人是谁？

sentences.english: But they all have full beards .
He has decided to grow a beard and a moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他已经决定留起络腮胡子和髭。

definition: variant of 絡腮鬍子|络腮胡子[luo4 sai1 hu2 zi5]
beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
